content.question: The second half of the third paragraph (“When . . . played it”) primarily serves to

choices.label: explain the impact of a character’s performing style
acknowledge the narrator’s limited ability to describe the music
mourn many of the reservation residents’ loss of self-knowledge

content.answer: explain the impact of a character’s performing style

skill.text: Skill 3.B: Explain the function of a particular sequence of events in a plot.
